characterBackground.q1: My mom ate my dad when I was seven, so I ate her. After that, I was on my own.
characterBackground.q2: I learned my skills from me, because I am the best person there ever was.
characterBackground.q3: 1. I am amazing 2. I am beautiful 3. I am strong
characterBackground.q4: That's funny that you would think I have flaws.
characterBackground.q5: I fear nothing because I am stronger and better and more beautiful than everything.
characterBackground.q6: Of course I am a hero. I am the best person in the world.
characterBackground.q7: My goals are already all accomplished, because I am the best.
characterBackground.q8: No. If you get on my bad side I am going to eat you. Why? Because I'm the best.
characterBackground.q9: I adventure because I am the best and most beautiful and the strongest and I want everybody in the world to meet me so I can prove it.

notes.title: I have a secret plan
notes.content: This is my plan. Read along carefully so that you completley understand. Did you understand?

notes.title: Reminders!
notes.content: I need to remember to sell my bow next time we make it to a town! Steal the eye from Ben sometime so I can use it for a prank.

notes.title: Ideas I Have Had
notes.content: I want to get a cyberkinetic arm that can shoot lazers shaped like sharks. Is that a thing? Steal the eye from Ben's chest and put it in Zack's pack without either of them noticing.

characterLog.title: Mission I
characterLog.details: I was walking down the street when out of the corner of my eye I saw a pretty little girl looking at me. Then I woke up and remember no girls will ever love me. It was a very sad mission.

customAbilities.name: Sound-Off, Sound-On
customAbilities.description: When shooting with a Dexterity-based bow, you can choose whether to attack with the power of song. This makes a jammin' tune, and an extra D4 of damage.

weapons.name: Assassin's Wrist Mounted Gun
weapons.description: A concealed gun favored by assassins. The gun springs open and can fire up to 5 silenced shots. Illegal in most cities and will raise eyebrows in others.
weapons.effects: Hidden Weapon: If someone is searching for weapons on your body, they need to pass a DC 20 investigation check to find this weapon.

wearables.name: A Bucket of Disguise
wearables.description: The wearer of the bucket truly believes that they are invisible. It is highly sought after, but there is an interesting quality that only someone who wears it discovers. The wearer begins to hear thoughts that are not their own.

items.name: All or Nothing Coin
items.description: Once per day, instead of rolling a d20, you can flip a coin. Heads = critical hit; Tails = critical fail.
